text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
I see. So you're doing it 
for your two moms……

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Yes! That's why my dream is to make
them proud by being the best horsegirl
in Japan!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Hehe, that's such a wonderful goal!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, thank you very much! 
What about you, Top Road……?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Mine might be a bit similar to yours. 
I want to live up to the expectations 
so many people have put on me…

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
And to do that, I'll keep running. 
My dream is to stand at the top!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
I want to be my very best for the people
who supported me. See, it's similar,
right?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Aha, that's true! 
That kind of makes me happy……♪

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Let's keep doing our best to make our 
dreams come true! Yeaaahh—!
